problem.p: What is your highest degree of education?

choice.name: PhD
choice.text: I have a PhD, MD, or equivalent

choice.name: Master
choice.text: I have a Masters degree or equivalent

choice.name: BS
choice.text: I have graduated from a four-year college or university

choice.name: AS
choice.text: I have graduated from a two-year college

choice.name: College
choice.text: I am in college, beyond the first year

choice.name: HS_Grad
choice.text: I have graduated from high school

choice.name: HS_Senior
choice.text: I am in my last year of high school or secondary school

choice.name: HS
choice.text: I am in high school or secondary school

choice.name: elementary_school
choice.text: I am in elementary or grammar school
